= Introduction =

The document type admintool will manage document types.  Its assumed a full list of relevant legal values is available inside the database (no specific admintool).

= Details =

 * List of all existing document types with edit/delete buttons
 * Search filters with livesearch for document types as well clauses/documents
 * Button to create a new document type
 * Tag has a document types and an integer "rank" value as well as a legal value (select box)
